name: Poor Baby!
description:
«Poor Baby!» has been developed during the GameJam 2023 of the Game Design Atelier at ZHdK. The requirements of the GameJam were to make a fighting game with the theme «the opposite of the power of friendship» within four days. The groups consisted of four to five people, which were bachelor students, master students and allumins mostly from the Game Design course, but we were also joined by a several composers from the Music courses.

MEET THE TEAM

Lorenz Kleiser (Technical Lead)

Léa Coquoz (Character Art)

Manuela Widmer (Level Art)

Esteban Umiglia (Music Composition)
